EmailTemplate.name: test Missing Information
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Reference PO #: _____________________________
Reviewing a recent repair submittal an error (or Omission) was found. The error (or Omission) was corrected during our order entry process and will no delay the repair of the unit. A revised PO submission is encouraged, however the unit will not be held for the corrected PO. If the revised PO is not received in advance of shipment, the unit will be shipped back without the information
Please provide missing information for the checked fields below by replying to this email with the missing information completed.
[ ] Product/Part #: ___________________________________ [ ] Serial #: ________________________________________ [ ] Quantity: ________________________________________ [ ] Work scope(Mod, Repair, or Overhaul): _______________________________________________________ [ ] Description of Damage: _________________________________ _______________________________________________________ _______________________________________________________ _______________________________________________________
Providing this information on your original submittal will minimize delays and the requirement for Honeywell to contact you for additional information.
Thank you, we appreciate your business! Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com Please visit our easy to navigate Web Portal at www.myaerospace.com.
